original_text: So I became great and surpassed all who were before me in Jerusalem. Also my wisdom remained with me.
korean_text: 내가 이같이 창성하여 나보다 먼저 예루살렘에 있던 모든 자들보다 더 창성하니 내 지혜도 내게 여전하도다

sentences.original_text: who were before me in Jerusalem.
Also my wisdom remained with me.
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 나의 지혜는 나와 함께 있었다
